aria-label.description: Accessible label when control does not need to render label tag.

disableScrollEnd.description: If true then scrollEnd event should NOT be emitted

focusable.description: Sets the focusability of the component. If value is true, the component becomes focusable. If value is false, the component becomes non-focusable. Component is focusable by default

isLoading.description: Takes a boolean value to indicate the loading state of data

offset.description: The number of pixels from the bottom of the element at which to trigger the scrollEnd event.

scrollContainer.description: Takes a CSS class selector to identify the scrolling element

scrollEnd.description: Event that is triggered when the user has scrolled to the bottom of the element.
